document.full_text: the united nations voiced deep concern on thursday at "grave, widespread and systematic" human rights violations in north korea and renewed the mandate of its special investigator on the situation in the reclusive country.
document.title: u.n. renews mandate of envoy to probe abuses in n.korea
lines_and_colors: the united nations voiced deep concern on thursday at "grave, widespread and systematic" human rights violations in north korea and renewed the mandate of its special investigator on the situation in the reclusive country.
